article: The 24+ Best Hinge Openers: Funny, Flirty, & Friendly
intro: Youâ€™ve Matched with someone on Hingeâ€”congrats! What do you say thatâ€™ll grab their attention and guarantee a response? These conversation starters, ice breakers, and pick-up lines will help get the ball rolling and lead you closer to that date. So, keep reading to find your best Hinge opener.
